REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Authorizes one percent of mobile sports tax revenue be used for problem gambling
Summary: Authorizes one percent of mobile sports tax revenue, but not less than six million dollars, to be used for problem gambling.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to authorizing one percent of mobile sports tax revenue be used for problem gambling
